# orion-note

Note is a component that displays a note message. It is used to display notes in forms. Use in conjunction with the `orion-text-input` component and other form components.

Additional documentation available at [orion.united.com](https://orion.united.com/)

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Slots

| Slot        | Description                   |
| ----------- | ----------------------------- |
| `"default"` | default slot for note content |
